# Prompt Info

Prompt Info is a Next.js app for planning prompts before you spend tokens. It includes:
- Token Planner: live token counts, tokenizer switching, and cost estimation by model.
- Format Comparison: render your prompt as TOON, JSON (pretty/compact), YAML, XML, and CSV with one click copy.
- Ros√© Pine theming (Night/Dawn) with accessible, readable glass styling.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js (App Router), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- gpt-tokenizer for token counts
- Supabase pricing with local JSON fallback

## Key Pages
- / : Token Planner
- /format-comparison : Format Comparison
- /about : About & references

## References
- TOON: https://github.com/toon-format/toon
- YAML 1.2.2: https://yaml.org/spec/1.2.2/
- JSON RFC 8259: https://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc8259
- XML 1.1: https://www.w3.org/TR/xml11/
- CSV RFC 4180: https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc4180
- OpenAPI 3.1: https://spec.openapis.org/oas/latest.html
- JSON Schema 2020-12: https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema
